name: flashlight
title: Flashlight
desc: A powerful AstroJS theme for your next project. Includes 6 themes, dark + light mode, functioning contact form, testimonials, and a single config file for a lightning fast launch.
article:
Introducing a refined website template developed with Tailwind CSS, designed to enhance your online presence with a blend of simplicity and functionality. This template comes equipped with six pre-configured themes, available in both light and dark modes, to suit a variety of preferences. Customization is straightforward: easily adjust or create new themes to reflect your brand, all through an intuitive setup.


Included in the template are essential pages such as Main, About, Contact, Team, Blog, FAQ, and Pricing, ensuring a complete and professional website. Everything can be managed via a single configuration file, making it possible to get your site up and running quickly. Moreover, the integrated contact form, supported by Formspree, provides a simple, cost-free way to connect with your audience.


This template offers everything necessary to establish a polished, fully functional website quickly and efficiently, ideal for businesses and individuals looking for a clean and effective online presence.
